00031 namespace Hypertable {

00033   typedef struct {
00034     String     log_dir;
00035     uint32_t   num;
00036     uint64_t   size;
00037     uint64_t   timestamp;
00038     bool       purge_log_dir;
00039     CommitLogBlockStream *block_stream;
00040   } CommitLogFileInfo;
00041 
00042   typedef std::deque<CommitLogFileInfo> LogFragmentQueue;
00043 
00046   class CommitLogBase : public ReferenceCount {
00047   public:
00048     CommitLogBase(const String &log_dir) : m_log_dir(log_dir), m_last_timestamp(0) {
00049       size_t lastslash = log_dir.find_last_of('/');
00050       if (lastslash == log_dir.length()-1)
00051         lastslash = log_dir.find_last_of('/', log_dir.length()-2);
00052       m_log_name = (lastslash == String::npos) ? log_dir : log_dir.substr(lastslash+1);
00053       return;
00054     }
00055 
00056     void stitch_in(CommitLogBase *other) {
00057       m_fragment_queue.insert(m_fragment_queue.end(), other->m_fragment_queue.begin(), other->m_fragment_queue.end());
00058     }
00059 
00060     String &get_log_dir() { return m_log_dir; }
00061 
00062   protected:
00063     String           m_log_dir;
00064     String           m_log_name;
00065     LogFragmentQueue m_fragment_queue;
00066     uint64_t         m_last_timestamp;
00067   };
00068   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<CommitLogBase> CommitLogBasePtr;
00069 
00070 }
